nodes.name: Sticky Note

parameters.content:
# Telegram ChatBot with multiple sessions

This workflow creates an **AI-powered Telegram chatbot** with **session management**, allowing users to:  
- **Start new conversations** (`/new`).  
- **Check current sessions** (`/current`).  
- **Resume past sessions** (`/resume`).  
- **Get summaries** (`/summary`).  
- **Ask questions** (`/question`). 

- Clone [this sheet]({{ $env.WEBHOOK_URL }}

nodes.name: Workflow Documentation

parameters.content:
# Telegram ChatBot with multiple sessions

## Overview
Automated workflow: Telegram ChatBot with multiple sessions. This workflow integrates 14 different services: telegramTrigger, stickyNote, telegram, code, agent. It contains 57 nodes and follows best practices for error handling and security.

## Workflow Details
- **Total Nodes**: 57
- **Node Types**: 14
- **Error Handling**: ✅ Implemented
- **Security**: ✅ Hardened (no sensitive data)
- **Documentation**: ✅ Complete

## Node Breakdown
- **OpenAI Chat Model**: lmChatOpenAi
- **Simple Memory**: memoryBufferWindow
- **Get message**: telegramTrigger
- **Command or text?**: switch
- **Get session**: googleSheets
- **Disable previous session**: googleSheets
- **Set new session**: googleSheets
- **Session activated**: telegram
- **Send response**: telegram
- **Update database**: googleSheets
- ... and 47 more nodes

## Usage Instructions
1. **Configure Credentials**: Set up all required API keys and credentials
2. **Update Variables**: Replace any placeholder values with actual data
3. **Test Workflow**: Run in test mode to verify functionality
4. **Deploy**: Activate the workflow for production use

## Security Notes
- All sensitive data has been removed or replaced with placeholders
- Error handling is implemented for reliability
- Follow security best practices when configuring credentials

## Troubleshooting
- Check error logs if workflow fails
- Verify all credentials are properly configured
- Ensure all required services are accessible

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.
